abstract.text: SwipeTammie is a custom view that enables swipe actions on a content view.

inlineContent.text: Implement swipeable actions to a view, with customizable actions on both left and right swipe directions.
To use SwipeTammie, you need to provide the content view, left and right actions, and an optional frame height.
